title: I want my loss back
body:
Riot, I do not understand why it is so hard for your system to detect players who Cheat.

I faced Xerath with 90% win rate who had 21 games.

Why wasn't he banned?
Why hasn't your system detected him yet?

All I am asking is for a smooth promo game. 

Can I ask for this?

replies.body:
Here's the Xerath's OPGG (click while my comment is still not removed by moderation)
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=trumptweets
Definitely looks like a scripter, but it's not enough to confirm it is one.

Because he could just be a smurf and smurfing isn't an offence.


Unless you can prove he's scripting.
